about_the_game:
Did you miss out on the Lunar Union Festival treasures? Fear not! This content pack allows you to purchase all the exclusive items, including radiant lanterns, elegant clothing, and mystical statues of the Lunar Spirit. Once purchased, these items will appear in your inventory, ready to adorn your island with the enchanting essence of the Lunar Union Festival. Don't let the magic slip away - grab the pack now and make your island shine with Lunar New Year splendor!



The Lunar New Year content pack includes:
  • 3 Lunar Fireworks sets to light up the night sky
  • Decorate your island with 3 Lunar Chinese Red Lanterns
  • Enjoy the unique Lunar Fish Dish
  • Grow your very own Lunar Tangerines with the Lunar Tangerine Seed, Plant and Fruit!
  • Dress to impress with the Lunar Red Shirt, Red Pants and Lunar Dragon Hat
  • Lunar Red Envelope
  • Adopt your very own adorable Lunar New Year Pet Rock
  • Add a majestic touch to your island decor with the Lunar Quad Dragon Statue

This content pack allows you to purchase all the exclusive items, including radiant lanterns, elegant clothing, and mystical statues of the Lunar Spirit. Once purchased, these items will appear in your inventory, ready to adorn your island with the enchanting essence of the Lunar Union Festival. Don't let the magic slip away - grab the pack now and make your island shine with Lunar New Year splendor!



The Lunar New Year content pack includes:

short_description: Missed the Lunar Union Festival? This content pack has you covered! Deck out your island with the exclusive Lunar New Year decorations and items. Purchase now and relive the festival's magic!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Norwegian*, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
